00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * This is file defines ASM primitives for sim magic functions.
00044 
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 75815 $<hr>
00046  *
00047  *
00048  */
00049 #ifndef __CVMX_SIM_MAGIC_H__
00050 #define __CVMX_SIM_MAGIC_H__
00051 
00052 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00053 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00054 extern "C" {
00055 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 /* Note, the following Magic function are only useful in the simulator
00059  * environment. Typical simple executive application should not use
00060  * these functions. Their access functions are defined and implemented in
00061  * the newlib
00062  *  SIM_MAGIC_PUTS
00063  *  SIM_MAGIC_WRITE
00064  *  SIM_MAGIC_READ
00065  *  SIM_MAGIC_OPEN
00066  *  SIM_MAGIC_CLOSE
00067  *  SIM_MAGIC_STAT
00068  *  SIM_MAGIC_FSTAT
00069  *  SIM_MAGIC_LSEEK
00070  *  SIM_MAGIC_ALLOC_MEM
00071  */
00072 
00073 /* Assembler macros for accessing simulator magic functions */
00074 #define OCTEON_SIM_MAGIC_TRAP_ADDRESS 0x8000000feffe0000ull
00075 
00076 /* Reg t9 (r25) specifies the actual magic function*/
00077 #define SIM_MAGIC_PUTS        0x05
00078 #define SIM_MAGIC_SIMPRINTF   0x06
00079 #define SIM_MAGIC_WRITE       0x07
00080 #define SIM_MAGIC_READ        0x08
00081 #define SIM_MAGIC_OPEN        0x09
00082 #define SIM_MAGIC_CLOSE       0x0A
00083 #define SIM_MAGIC_STAT        0x0B
00084 #define SIM_MAGIC_FSTAT       0x0C
00085 #define SIM_MAGIC_LSEEK       0x0D
00086 #define SIM_MAGIC_ALLOC_MEM   0x20
00087 #define SIM_MAGIC_GET_CPUFREQ 0x31  /* SDK 1.9 release and after */
00088 #define SIM_MAGIC_GET_MEMFREQ 0x32  /* SDK 1.9 release and after */
00089 #define SIM_MAGIC_GET_IOFREQ  0x33  /* SDK 2.0 release and after, only set in Octeon2 */
00090 
00091 /**
00092  * @INTERNAL
00093  * sim_magci implementation function with return code.
00094  *
00095  * @param func_no   SIM magic function to invoke
00096  *
00097  * @return Result of the SIM magic function
00098  */
00099 static inline int __cvmx_sim_magic_return(unsigned long long func_no)
00100 {
00101     register unsigned long long magic_addr asm("$15");
00102     register unsigned long long magic_func asm("$25");  /* t9 */
00103     int ret;
00104 
00105     magic_addr = OCTEON_SIM_MAGIC_TRAP_ADDRESS;
00106     magic_func = func_no;
00107     asm volatile ("dadd $24, $31, $0 \n" "jalr  $15 \n" "dadd $31, $24, $0 \n" "move %0, $2":"=r" (ret)
00108               :"r"(magic_addr), "r"(magic_func)
00109               :"$2", "$24");
00110 
00111     return ret;
00112 }
00113 
00114 /**
00115  * @INTERNAL
00116  * sim_magci implementation function without return code.
00117  *
00118  * @param func_no   SIM magic function to invoke
00119  */ static inline void __cvmx_sim_magic_no_return(unsigned long long func_no)
00120 {
00121     register unsigned long long magic_addr asm("$15");
00122     register unsigned long long magic_func asm("$25");  /* t9 */
00123 
00124     magic_addr = OCTEON_SIM_MAGIC_TRAP_ADDRESS;
00125     magic_func = func_no;
00126     asm volatile ("dadd $24, $31, $0 \n" "jalr  $15 \n" "dadd $31, $24, $0 \n"::"r" (magic_addr), "r"(magic_func)
00127               :"$24");
00128 
00129 }
00130 
00131 /**
00132  * @INTERNAL
00133  * SIM magic printf function, only support up to 8 parameters
00134  *
00135  * @param format
00136  */
00137 static inline void __cvmx_sim_magic_simprintf(const char *format, ...)
00138 {
00139     CVMX_SYNC;
00140 
00141     __cvmx_sim_magic_no_return(SIM_MAGIC_SIMPRINTF);
00142 }
00143 
00144 /**
00145  * Retrive cpu core clock frequency from the simulator
00146  *
00147  * @return simulating core frequency
00148  */
00149 static inline int cvmx_sim_magic_get_cpufreq(void)
00150 {
00151     CVMX_SYNC;
00152 
00153     return __cvmx_sim_magic_return(SIM_MAGIC_GET_CPUFREQ);
00154 }
00155 
00156 /**
00157  * Retrive DDR clock frequency from the simulator
00158  *
00159  * @return simulating DDR frequency
00160  */
00161 static inline int cvmx_sim_magic_get_memfreq(void)
00162 {
00163     CVMX_SYNC;
00164 
00165     return __cvmx_sim_magic_return(SIM_MAGIC_GET_MEMFREQ);
00166 }
00167 
00168 /**
00169  * Retrive io core clock frequency from the simulator
00170  *
00171  * @return simulating core frequency
00172  */
00173 static inline int cvmx_sim_magic_get_iofreq(void)
00174 {
00175     CVMX_SYNC;
00176 
00177     if (OCTEON_IS_OCTEON2())
00178         return __cvmx_sim_magic_return(SIM_MAGIC_GET_IOFREQ);
00179     else
00180         return 0;
00181 }
00182 
00183 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00184 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00185 }
00186 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00187 #endif
00188 
00189 #endif /* __CVMX_SIM_MAGIC_H__ */
